Title: Bagru Block Print Mustard Straight Shorts
Description: A short shorts makes for a perfect wardrobe pick to deal with hot summer days. What makes them even better is a comfy straight fit and functional pockets. Pull on a white tee, and take it everywhere with you - casual day-out, beach, or a brunch.

Title: Bottle Green Handspun Cotton Short Shorts
Description: Get your chic vibe on with our short shorts. Made from 100% cotton, these mid-rise shorts come with 2 patch pockets and 2 slash pockets for all your treasures. Style these with a tube top and slide sandals for an easy and comfy lounge attire.

Title: Blue Vegetable Dyed Straight Fit Shorts
Description: Looking for shorts that you can wear to a beach and lounge in too? Our vegetable-dyed straight fit shorts are what you need. With a banded waist and knife pleats for a contemporary silhouette, these come complete with inseam pockets to carry your stuff. Style these shorts with a white crop top and slide sandals for a relaxed day by the waves.

Title: Powder Blue Checkered Handspun Shorts
Description:
Take comfort in a classic with our checkered 100% Cotton Muslin Shorts. It features a half-elasticated waist with an attached belt for a secure grip. The shorts come with a tie-up at the front and 2 Slash Pockets for essentials.
Pair it with an off white shirt and flip-ons for a fresh look.

Title: Beige Dabu Print Cotton Flared Shorts
Description: Heading out for brunch in the summer heat? It can't get comfier than our flared shorts. Fully elasticated at the waist for ease of wearing, it is natural-dyed using the hand-lep Dabu technique, which makes it skin-friendly. Complete with spacious slash pockets for all your stuff, pair it up with a white camisole and slide sandals to let your skin breathe.

Title: Block Printed Striped Boxer Shorts
Description: You haven't felt comfortable until you've put on these short boxer shorts. Breezy cotton cambric fabric, a loose fit, and inseam pockets - it doesn't get any comfier. The handcrafted tasseled drawstrings make it prettier to hang around in it all day paired with a blue crop top!

Title: Vegetable Dyed Off-White Paneled Shorts
Description: Perfect for anyone who loves a blend of checks and stripes. These pocket-friendly paneled shorts come with slash pockets to rest your hands (and your stuff!). The fully elasticated waist makes it easy to wear, while the vegetable dyed 100% cotton ensures it's skin-friendliness. Style it with your favorite white spaghetti top and slide sandals for a perfect brunch by the sea.

Title: Floral Block Print Comfort Fit Shorts
Description: When summer gets too hot to bear, get your short shorts on. It has soft cotton fabric, relaxed fit, and patch pockets to keep you snug. Get out in the sun any day or to a brunch wearing these short shorts with a mustard crop top.

Title: Violet Striped Mangalgiri Cotton Shorts
Description: Airy and soft, these Mangalgiri cotton shorts are sure to become your favorite this summer. With slash pockets to slide in your essentials, these short shorts feature a half elasticated waist for a comfortable fit. Strike a pose at the beach in these shorts styles with a midriff top and flip-flops.

Title: Khaki Vegetable Dyed Handspun Short Shorts
Description: For days as hot as the sun, our short shorts are perfect. It's a cute pair of violet shorts made from Mangalgiri cotton, in a relaxed silhouette with patch pockets. It features a fully elasticated waist with an attached belt for a snug fit. These shorts keep you feeling breezy all day, no matter where you go - the beach, brunch, or a day out. Complete the look with an ecru flared camisole and slide sandals.

Title: Black Elasticated Short Cotton Boxers
Description: A pair of short black boxers made of breathable cotton, printed in geometric Bagru print, and has pockets. What is more snug and cute? Pair it with a black top, and head out for a run on the beach!

Title: Brick Red Block Print Floral Hot Pants
Description: When summer gets too hot to bear, compete it with your hot pants. It has soft cotton fabric, relaxed fit, and inseam pockets to keep you snug. Get out in the sun any day or to a brunch wearing these hot pants with a black top.
